articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Paraguay
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Paraguay 
    Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet on Mar. 27 by the Arandura Publishing House of Paraguay.
 The work, published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies the originality and superiority of the Juche philosophy to the preceding philosophy of the working class.    
 The Juche philosophy serves as the revolutionary philosophy, political philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea, the work says, advancing the principled matters that should be held fast to in the study and explanation of the Juche philosophy.

Congratulations to Maltese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Maltese President 
    Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message to Eddie Fenech Adami, congratulating him on his election as president of Malta.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the Maltese president and wished him great success in his responsible work for the country's development and people's wellbeing.

Cambodian King to Visit DPRK

Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Russia
     Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia was inaugurated to commemorate the Day of the Sun on March 30.
  Ju Hui Chol, chairman of the central association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
  The committee decided to hold colorful functions such as meeting, public presentation of contents of books and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

Greetings to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Senegalese President
    Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on April 1 sent a message of greetings to Senegalese President Abdoulaye Wade on the occasion of the 44thanniversary of the independence of Senegal.
 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president great success in his responsible work for the democratic development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Malaysian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Malaysian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Datuk Sri Syed Hamid Albar upon his reappointment as Malaysian foreign minister.
 The message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation daily developing on good terms between the two countries would grow stronger.
